column4: @SLSWEETS767 @Chris4Perkins Yes. I know. I think you read me wrong.\nThe police are telling THE VICTIM to not say anything. I'm saying the cop should come in civvies in an unmarked car and see what Navy Vet has to deal with.

@SputterOnline @Chris4Perkins Neighborhood bully AND not backing down from the POLICE BULLY. It‚Äôs 2021, it is well past time for POC to be treated as the 1st class citizens they are.  3

@SputterOnline @Chris4Perkins We are all Human Beings, walking this Earth. We all have value and worth, if only to ourselves. I‚Äôm not color-blind, I‚Äôm enriched by the colors around me- we aren‚Äôt the same outside, but we all bleed red.  4 final

@SputterOnline @Chris4Perkins He‚Äôs been wronged because of the color of his skin- he‚Äôs served to protect the rights of the same yahoos who are BREAKING the law. Now he‚Äôs being harassed even more for standing up to the. 2

I hate racist. I hate racist cops. But there's nothing worse than a low grade racist cop. Let me explain. There's a Sgt in the Sheriff's dept that is a community relations officer. He's been to my house several times. We've talk a lot. He askedme to make some concessions to make
@Chris4Perkins Have you filed a complaint against the department with the state AG?
@Chris4Perkins Anyone who presumes the worst of anyone without knowing anything about them personally is a racist.
@bkayetwit @Chris4Perkins Huh?  Could you rephrase that the way you would if your tweet had been a first draft?  Thx.
@DonnerAndChris @bkayetwit I try to live by a code of how I want to be treated.
@Chris4Perkins @bkayetwit I'd be your neighbor/friend (and the Mrs) in a red hot minute.
@bkayetwit @Chris4Perkins Like you just did?
@bkayetwit @Chris4Perkins That‚Äôs actually prejudice but still wrong
@1andonlycamille @Chris4Perkins True.  A presumption is a prejudice.

@Chris4Perkins @bkayetwit This exchange, right here.
Made my day.
It's ok to get something wrong.
It's ok to identify someone else not understanding something you've said.
It's ok to clarify.
It's okay to admit a mistake and apologize.
Reconciliation is ok.

We don't have to go to Defcon 4 immediately.

@DonnerAndChris @Chris4Perkins @bkayetwit This right here. Absolutely the same. It was quickly clarified and cleared. I just wish everyone was so quick to say sorry for misunderstandings.
@bkayetwit My bad. I'm still a little raw from the DA that just said we can be executed by cops.

Was to prioritize white fragility. How did I know? He constantly tried to deflect from the fact that racist were coming to my house. He tried to convince me that I was the problem. That they're coming to my house because I made them. Totally excusing their actions. Now he wants

@Chris4Perkins I'm reading a book titled White Fragility. It's very interesting & addresses white ppl getting defensive when racism is brought up. So far its spot on & asks ppl to take a moment & reflect on their initial reaction to diff situations. U recommended white ppl read it.
@realpuffpaffer The fact that their racism believes I was dumb and gullible is really insulting.

@Chris4Perkins Exactly. It's such a balance act to make them feel smarter so it's to your advantage. You shouldn't HAVE to do this because they're so damn dumb! \nMy Godson has this down to a science. Watching him do it is like ballet. Lol. \nBut I'd rather no one has to put on this performance.

@Chris4Perkins Oh you know the game they're playing. It's obvious. And even though you just play along to make them think they're "smarter" or they've "won", you know the truth. \nLife would be SO much easier for everyone if these people would just stop.
@Chris4Perkins I was agreeing with you. I am in your lane on this.
